name: Super Special Secret Santa 2 COMBINED TURBO EDITION
name_original: Super Special Secret Santa 2 COMBINED TURBO EDITION
description:
A special present to ALLLL the bitsyfolk of the Secret Santa (and to just bitsyfolk everywhere) which uses all the prompts in the spreadsheet in a fill-in-the blank randomized story telling game!

You basically get a random story section and have to fill in the blanks using a randomized pool of prompt words. As you go along you keep adding to the story, and at the end you can read the whole thing, and also download a copy of the whole story. (downloading requires you to use the mouse to click a link which pops up).

A whole slew of hacks were used, I'll probably list them later. (sorry ayo and other hack makers :P )
